coverage_details.checkup: Covered per age group; see details
coverage_details.vaccination: Vaccinations as per MOH schedule, travel vaccinations; require pre-authorization
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit: SR 400.00 as part of optical limit
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: Covered (newborn hearing screening, congenital heart anomalies screening, and metabolic screening)
coverage_details.psychiatric: Covered (inpatient/outpatient mental health); addiction/substance abuse not covered except in life-threatening episodes
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Covered (initial, then replacement every 2 years or sooner if required); approval managed by Bupa Arabia
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Full coverage from date of birth
coverage_details.circumcision: Covered for newborn boys (no age limit)
coverage_details.congenital: Covered for all congenital illnesses with functional benefit (not for purely cosmetic treatments)
coverage_details.maternity: Covered for normal deliveries, antenatal and postnatal care, caesarean deliveries (when medically necessary), miscarriage, legal abortion, and other complications; elective C-section not covered
coverage_details.optical: SR 400.00; Single/Bifocal/Trifocal/Lenticular lenses covered; Polarized, UV, tints covered
coverage_details.autism: Covered up to SR 50,000 annual limit (CCHI limitations); includes diagnosis, investigations, rehabilitation
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Covered for newborn girls (no age limit)
coverage_details.screening: Preventive care and annual checkup by age/sex: tests such as CBC, LFT, Lipid panel, renal function, physical exam, Pap smear, mammogram, PSA, colonoscopy, DEXA scan, etc. All require pre-approval
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Pre-authorization limit per visit SR 4,000 inc. consultations or medications; see detailed list for pre-approval requirements (services, surgeries, checkups, screenings, etc.)
coverage_details.special_instructions: Two dietitian visits covered per year (no limit if medically justified). Oral maxillofacial surgeries covered if due to accident, trauma, congenital/developmental defect, or pathology (not cosmetic). Septoplasty covered if justified; rhinoplasty only when combined with justified septoplasty. Pain management covered post operation and for chronic pain (requires approval). Vitamins/supplements covered if deficiency evident in lab. Ambulance covered for local emergencies only. Medical devices/consumables covered with pre-authorization. Herbal treatments, dental prosthetics, infertility treatment (except fertility enhancement medications), alternative medicine, podiatry, cosmetic dermatology (functional medical necessity only), under trial procedures, and non-therapeutic genetic tests are excluded. Emergency and elective treatment outside KSA or the network are excluded. Work-related injuries are not covered (GOSI responsibility).
